channel.description: Recent content in Rmd on Hailey Gryka

item.title: Exploratory Data Analysis using Pandas Profiling
item.description: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) is an essential step in any data science project. This step allows us to remove unuseful/incorrect data, understand the relationships within the data, and provides context required to develop models that will ultimately allow for accurte interpretation of results. EDA can be a time consuming process and this step will have to be revisited if shortcuts are taken. However, pandas-profiling is an extremely powerful python package that can help with this process.

item.title: Plotting London Boroughs
item.description: Introduction This Rmarkdown document shows the use of both R and Python for analyzing the London Boroughs dataset. The reticulate library allows us to use Python code in an R environment. Load Libraries library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.2 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.0.3 v dplyr 1.0.1 ## v tidyr 1.1.0 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 1.3.1 v forcats 0.
